author: Ari (Onii-chan#3920), sravan (sravan#0001)
name: Perform
description: Perform Actions like kiss, cuddle etc.
install_msg: Hello and thank you for installing this cog, this cog shouldn't contain any nsfw gifs and allows you to interact with other people. Make sure to use `[p]performapi` to see the steps needed to set the api required for the cog
